creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Create stories and build your own world with Toca Life World. You’ll get all the fun of your other favorite Toca Life apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital, and more, all together in one place.

INTRODUCING TOCA LIFE: WORLD
Want to give grandma a wild hairstyle? Bring a sloth to the Skate Park? Or just hang out with friends? If you thought it was fun to dive into a Toca Life app and do whatever you want then you were right. This is your own world where you build characters and create stories your way. Make storylines and discover that anything is possible today.

You can even go further and create stories with your favorite characters in any location you want. Want to take a pet to School? Go for it. Take the doctor to the Salon and dye her hair green? Rock on. In Toca Life World you’re the boss. Build characters, create stories, and play the way you want.

MAKE STORYLINES, BUILD CHARACTERS & CREATE YOUR OWN WORLD - WHY YOU’LL LOVE TO PLAY TOCA LIFE WORLD

FIRST 8 LOCATIONS & 39 CHARACTERS INCLUDED
You can visit Bop City, a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to discover, like the hairdresser, the shopping mall and food court, or even an apartment. It’s a great start when you want to build your own world!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Do you already play other apps within the Toca Life series? City? Vacation? Office? Great! When you download Toca Life World, we’ll help you bring all of that stuff into the mega-app. Then you can start mixing and matching locations and characters to create heaps of new storylines.

BUY NEW LOCATIONS AND CHARACTERS
If you want to discover more locations, that’s cool. Toca Life World has a shop where more than 50 locations, 300 characters, and 125 pets are available for purchase. With different prices from small to big, you can decide to add a little or a lot. We’ll always be updating with more locations, characters and crazy things to do.

GIFTS EVERY WEEK
Guess what? You don’t need to make purchases in the shop to get new items to add to your world. Check back every week and discover exclusive surprise gifts!

Discover exciting storylines, build characters, and don’t miss out on a moment of fun - download Toca Life World today!

About Us:

At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 200 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: A UNIVERSITY is opening in Vox Valley and you have an acceptance letter! The time has come to wave goodbye to your family and move into your new home in the dormitory. Grab a coffee in the campus café or shoot some hoops with your new roommate in the park. Don’t forget to attend some classes too… after all, you’re here to learn!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Even more cool stuff added to HOME DESIGNER!

Want to put a fridge next to the toilet? Shower in the bedroom? You got it! BUILD, FURNISH and now also DECORATE houses anyway you’d like!

We’ve also added two new secrets to Bop City… head to the Storage location to find them!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s time for the HARVEST FESTIVAL! Head over to Morning Meadows and prepare for a BIG feast. Challenge your friend to a pumpkin growing contest and make the weirdest victory juice ever with the juice machine.

New VACATION POOL HOUSE pack for Home Designer in the Shop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Do you dream of directing your own movie? You’re in luck! We just heard there’s a new MOVIE STUDIO opening in Vox Valley. Use the green screen and props to set your scene, whether it’s a day in the park or a space adventure, it’s up to you!

The holiday season is here! Check out the new FESTIVE FURNITURE PACK for Home Designer. It’s filled with furniture and decorations to give your home that cozy winter feeling.

Movie Studio and Festive Furniture Pack are coming soon to the in-app shop!

Let's celebrate the month of hearts and candy with a new release in Home Designer - the new NEON RAINBOW APARTMENT! This delightful, pastel-colored home is packed with unique and colorful furniture, as well as a lovely balcony for some fresh air. After a full day of decorating, switch on your neon lights for a cozy evening!

The NEON RAINBOW APARTMENT pack is coming soon to the in-app shop!

title: Toca Life World: Build stories & create your world

creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Create stories and build your own world with Toca Life World. You’ll get all the fun of your other favorite Toca Life apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital, and more, all together in one place.

INTRODUCING TOCA LIFE WORLD
Want to give grandma a wild hairstyle? Bring a sloth to the Skate Park? Or just hang out with friends? If you thought it was fun to dive into a Toca Life app and do whatever you want then you were right. This is your own world where you build characters and create stories your way. Make storylines and discover that anything is possible today.

You can even go further and create stories with your favorite characters in any location you want. Want to take a pet to School? Go for it. Take the doctor to the Salon and dye her hair green? Rock on. In Toca Life World you’re the boss. Build characters, create stories, and play the way you want.

MAKE STORYLINES, BUILD CHARACTERS & CREATE YOUR OWN WORLD - WHY YOU’LL LOVE TO PLAY TOCA LIFE WORLD

FIRST 8 LOCATIONS & 39 CHARACTERS INCLUDED
You can visit Bop City, a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to discover, like the hairdresser, the shopping mall and food court, or even an apartment. It’s a great start when you want to build your own world!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Do you already play other apps within the Toca Life series? City? Vacation? Office? Great! When you download Toca Life World, we’ll help you bring all of that stuff into the mega-app. Then you can start mixing and matching locations and characters to create heaps of new storylines.

BUY NEW LOCATIONS AND CHARACTERS
If you want to discover more locations, that’s cool. Toca Life World has a shop where more than 50 locations, 300 characters, and 125 pets are available for purchase. With different prices from small to big, you can decide to add a little or a lot. We’ll always be updating with more locations, characters and crazy things to do.

GIFTS EVERY WEEK
Guess what? You don’t need to make purchases in the shop to get new items to add to your world. Check back every week and discover exclusive surprise gifts!

Discover exciting storylines, build characters, and don’t miss out on a moment of fun - download Toca Life World today!

About Us:

At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 200 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Don’t hold it in! Show how you’re REALLY feeling with the brand-new CHARACTER EXPRESSION tool coming soon! Silly up your trip to the hairdresser or cause some DRAMA in the fancy restaurant with your mysterious grin. Tell the stories YOU want and work through those emotions until you find exactly the right attitude.

And that’s not all, a NEW FEATURE has just arrived in the Home Designer tool! You can now FLIP certain pieces of furniture and VOILA, they’ll fit perfectly into your space.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Looking for the perfect place to meet up, laugh, share secrets over coffee, or bake some delicious buns? appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Let's celebrate friendship and create new memories together! With the HELLO KITTY AND FRIENDS FURNITURE PACK you can decorate rooms in the cute and quirky styles of Hello Kitty, My Melody, Badtz Maru, Kuromi and Gudetama. Then, for 12 happy days in December, the festive Hello Kitty and Friends Gift Event will shower you with free surprises!

Holiday shopping for friends and family? Be sure to visit the new POM-POM EMPORIUM in Pom-Pom Peaks.

Coming soon to the Post Office and in-app shop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Let's celebrate friendship and create new memories together! With the HELLO KITTY® AND FRIENDS FURNITURE PACK you can decorate rooms in the cute and quirky styles of Hello Kitty®, My Melody™, Badtz Maru™, Kuromi™ and Gudetama™. Holiday shopping for friends and family? Be sure to visit the new POM-POM EMPORIUM in Pom-Pom Peaks.

Coming soon to the Post Office and in-app shop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Have you seen the new urban flat that’s move-in ready? It’s the sleek DOWNTOWN LOFT that just arrived to Home Designer. Shoot some hoops or play table tennis, kick it on the balcony or host a popcorn filled gaming party! Design the place to have a rugged, chilled out look or make it super neat and shiny — the possibilities are endless and the choice all yours.

The DOWNTOWN LOFT for Home Designer is coming soon to the in-app shop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Get ready to get your house in order with the latest FREE content added to Home Designer. Since this update is released around Earth Day, we’ve been inspired to introduce things that may break but can be fixed. Other objects may seem like trash at first but can easily be remade into something new and exciting. Finally, there are objects that are actually trash and should go into the new free recycling bins, because sustainable thinking is the way to go!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Would you like to work out like a superstar athlete? Or coach a team to glorious victories against all odds? Perhaps interview the biggest stars or host an e-sports event? You’ll be able to do all this and more in the brand new All-Star Stadium - the Toca Life World arena for soccer, football, and track & field! There’s even a merch shop where you can get all the stuff you need to show support for your favorite team!

ALL-STAR STADIUM is a two-location playset coming soon to the in-app shop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Introducing Romantic Beach House, a dreamy beachside villa for romantic vacations, destination weddings, anniversary celebrations, big family b-day parties or journeys dedicated to simply enjoying life on a tropical island! Plan your picture perfect strolls by the water, relaxing in your shell-swing under the palm trees, or treat loved ones to new exciting recipes in your own hotel restaurant!

title: Toca Life World: Build stories

creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Create stories and build your own world with Toca Life World. You’ll get all the fun of your other favorite Toca Life apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital, and more, all together in one place.

INTRODUCING TOCA LIFE WORLD
Want to give grandma a wild hairstyle? Bring a sloth to the Skate Park? Or just hang out with friends? If you thought it was fun to dive into a Toca Life app and do whatever you want then you were right. This is your own world where you build characters and create stories your way. Make storylines and discover that anything is possible today.

You can even go further and create stories with your favorite characters in any location you want. Want to take a pet to School? Go for it. Take the doctor to the Salon and dye her hair green? Rock on. In Toca Life World you’re the boss. Build characters, create stories, and play the way you want.

MAKE STORYLINES, BUILD CHARACTERS & CREATE YOUR OWN WORLD - WHY YOU’LL LOVE TO PLAY TOCA LIFE WORLD

FIRST 8 LOCATIONS & 39 CHARACTERS INCLUDED
You can visit Bop City, a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to discover, like the hairdresser, the shopping mall and food court, or even an apartment. It’s a great start when you want to build your own world!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Do you already play other apps within the Toca Life series? City? Vacation? Office? Great! When you download Toca Life World, we’ll help you bring all of that stuff into the mega-app. Then you can start mixing and matching locations and characters to create heaps of new storylines.

BUY NEW LOCATIONS AND CHARACTERS
If you want to discover more locations, that’s cool. Toca Life World has a shop where more than 100 locations, 500 characters, and 500 pets are available for purchase. With different prices from small to big, you can decide to add a little or a lot. We’ll always be updating with more locations, characters and crazy things to do.

GIFTS EVERY WEEK
Guess what? You don’t need to make purchases in the shop to get new items to add to your world. Check back every week and discover exclusive surprise gifts!

Discover exciting storylines, build characters, and don’t miss out on a moment of fun - download Toca Life World today!

About Us:

At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 200 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy

descriptionShort: Create your world & characters

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Coming soon to Home Designer! A fully customizable Local Shop where you can create the store or cafe you’ve always wanted to run! Set up signs and decorate your area, then bring in goods from all over Toca Life World and you’re open for business!

What will you begin with? A cat cafe? An ice-cream dream? A vintage clothes store? A chef’s boutique? Something else? We can’t wait to see it!

descriptionShort: Create your world & characters

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Coming soon to the in-app shop: a Home Designer Pack that has everything you need to create scary stories, ghost stories, halloween stories, amazing make-overs and appalling make-unders! Not to boast but this is our least luxurious pack to date, featuring cracks in the wall, leaking pipes, barred windows and glow in the dark skeletons! Is it too scary? Perhaps. Is it fun enough? Definitely! Try your hands at the Creepy Furniture Pack today, it’s boo-tiful!

descriptionShort: Design & play your characters. Build a fun community & play with your friends.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All aboard! It’s always go-time at Central Station, whether you’re commuting to class with a friend, secretly practicing your graffiti skills or making your debut in the big city. Grab an iced tea at Cool Beany Coffee and people-watch with a friend, then jump in the photo booth and capture some memories to take back home. If you get some flowers from Nicholas, be sure to try and figure out just why he looks so familiar.

Central Station is a two-location playset coming soon to the in-app shop!

If you want more locations, that’s cool. Toca Life World has a shop where more than 100 locations, 500 characters, and 500 pets are available for purchase. With different prices from small to big, you can decide to add a little or a lot. We’ll always be updating with more locations, characters and crazy things to do.

GIFTS EVERY WEEK
Guess what? You don’t need to make purchases in the shop to get new items to add to your world. Check back every week to get exclusive surprise gifts!

About Us:

At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 200 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy
descriptionShort: Design & play your characters. Build a fun community & play with your friends.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All aboard! It’s always go-time at Central Station, whether you’re commuting to class with a friend, secretly practicing your graffiti skills or making your debut in the big city. Grab an iced tea at Cool Beany Coffee and people-watch with a friend, then jump in the photo booth and capture some memories to take back home. If you get some flowers from Nicholas, be sure to try and figure out just why he looks so familiar.

Central Station is a two-location playset coming soon to the in-app shop!

title: Toca Life World: Build a Story

creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Create your own world and play out any story you like with Toca Life World. You’ll get all the fun of your other favorite Toca Life apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital and more, all together in one place.

INTRODUCING TOCA LIFE WORLD
Want to give grandma a wild hairstyle? Bring a sloth to the Skate Park? Or just hang out with friends? If you thought it was fun to dive into a Toca Life app and do whatever you want then you were right. Anything is possible and the choices are all yours.

Go even further by creating stories with your favorite characters in any location you want. Want to take a pet to School? Go for it. Take the doctor to the Salon and dye her hair green? Rock on. In Toca Life World you’re the boss and you create stories the way you want.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE PLAYING TOCA LIFE WORLD​

FIRST 8 LOCATIONS & 39 CHARACTERS INCLUDED

descriptionShort: Design & play your characters. Build a fun community & play with your friends.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Get ready for play time with your fluffy bestie, something ADORABLE is coming to Home Designer! Decorate your dream house with pet-friendly furniture, beds, bowls, climbing trees, toys and much more! The Fluffy Friends House is ready for cuteness and chaos overload. Enjoy hopping from sleepy kitten cuddles on the couch to puppy playtime in the garden. Oh no! Looks like you left your fluffy friend alone for too long… now there are paw-prints and scratches EVERYWHERE!

descriptionShort: Design & play your characters. Build a fun community & play with your friends.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Coming SOON to the in-app shop: a furniture pack that’s all about channeling your vibes your way. Pick the style that is most YOU — indie, romantic, gamer or rebel OR mix & match as you please! What will you do first? Copy your and your friends’ real world rooms, go nuts with makeovers or make up something completely new? You decide! After all, this pack is all about your room, your rules and your style!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: For the first time in Toca Boca history, we’re releasing an entire unfurnished building ready to be transformed by YOU. The Bonsai Building, characterized by its light wood and glass has a relaxing, airy appeal. It’s a perfect fit for a harmonious home, spa, gym or anything else you can think of. We can’t wait to see what you make with it!

title: Toca Life World: Build a Story

creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Create your own world and play out any story you like with Toca Life World. You’ll get all the fun of your other favorite Toca Life apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital and more, all together in one place.

INTRODUCING TOCA LIFE WORLD
Want to give grandma a wild hairstyle? Bring a sloth to the Skate Park? Or just hang out with friends? If you thought it was fun to dive into a Toca Life app and do whatever you want then you were right. Anything is possible and the choices are all yours.

Go even further by creating stories with your favorite characters in any location you want. Want to take a pet to School? Go for it. Take the doctor to the Salon and dye her hair green? Rock on. In Toca Life World you’re the boss and you create stories the way you want.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE PLAYING TOCA LIFE WORLD​

FIRST 8 LOCATIONS & 39 CHARACTERS INCLUDED
You can visit Bop City, a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to explore, like the hairdresser, the shopping mall and food court, or even an apartment. It’s a great place to start building your own World!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Are you already playing with apps in the Toca Life series? Great! When you download Toca Life World, we’ll help you bring all of that stuff into the mega-app. Then you can start mixing and matching locations and characters however you want.

BUY NEW LOCATIONS AND CHARACTERS
If you want more locations, that’s cool. Toca Life World has a shop where more than 100 locations, 500 characters, and 500 pets are available for purchase. With different prices from small to big, you can decide to add a little or a lot. We’ll always be updating with more locations, characters and crazy things to do.

GIFTS EVERY WEEK
Guess what? You don’t need to make purchases in the shop to get new items to add to your world. Check back every week to get exclusive surprise gifts!

About Us:

At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 200 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We know you’ve been waiting for a cozy place like this; a corner restaurant ready to be designed, run and visited by you (and crumpets)! Use the decor it comes with or bring in items and styles from any other Home Designer house to make it a restaurant YOU love. We know you’ll create fun, food filled dramas to be played out in your new Cozy Restaurant. Speaking of drama, try flambéing your food! It’s perfect when staging cooking shows or competitions.

descriptionShort: Create and play your game characters. Design a mini world and choose your story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Get your ticket ready, Voxella Festival is here! Steal the show with a fresh hairstyle and your best outfit. Grab your friends and dance ALL day watching your favorite artists perform. Snap selfies and buy merch to decorate your bedroom with festival memories! Legs achy from port-a-potty lines? Eaten too many ice cream waffles? Head back to your tent or luxe it up at the VIP area! Or is it YOUR time to shine? Make your festival debut as a rising star or perform a headline show to your superfans!

title: Toca Life World: Build a Story

creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Toca Life World is a game with endless possibilities, where you design and decorate a whole world and fill it with fun characters you collect, create and play! Tell your own stories, whatever they may be – adventures, make-over tales, reality shows, or anything and everything you can imagine! What will you do first – spend a day at the beach with friends or direct your own sitcom? Design a restaurant or run a dog daycare center? Express yourself, explore a mini world filled with fun and don't forget to collect your free gift every Friday!

YOU’LL LOVE TOCA LIFE WORLD​ BECAUSE YOU CAN:
• Download the app for FREE and start playing right away
• Use the Home Designer tool to design & decorate your own houses
• Make your own unique characters with the Character Creator
• Get free exciting gifts every Friday
• Explore new game locations
• Unlock hundreds of secrets
• Connect your other Toca Life apps
• Create and play on a secure platform

CREATE YOUR OWN CHARACTERS & HOMES
Toca Life World is the perfect game for anyone looking to explore, express themselves and let their creativity shine. Or, you can get cozy and have a quiet moment relaxing in your mini world! How you play is up to you: you're in charge of building your own world, creating your own characters and homes and telling your own stories!

WEEKLY GIFTS
Every Friday, players can claim brand new gifts at the Post Office, completely free of charge. Besides Fridays, there are also other gift events to look out for. Over the years, we’ve celebrated Lunar New Year, Valentine’s Day, the winter holidays and more with awesome gift events! And don’t worry if you’re new to the game, you haven't missed out! We have annual Gift Bonanzas when we re-release selections of previous years’ gifts so you can build your new world!

11 LOCATIONS & 40+ CHARACTERS INCLUDED IN THE FREE GAME DOWNLOAD
The basic yet extensive version of Toca Life World is free to download. Start discovering your mini world by visiting Bop City, a vibrant city area with many different locations all ready for you to discover. Check out the hair salon, shopping mall, food court, and your first apartment! It’s a great place to unlock secrets, decorate, create and play your own stories!

THE HOME DESIGNER & CHARACTER CREATOR TOOLS
The fun Home Designer (including a Free House) and Character Creator tools are included in the free game download. They’re both perfect for expressing yourself: decorate your houses and buildings in your unique style and create and play your own characters!

GET NEW LOCATIONS AND ITEMS
Already discovered all the free game locations and want to explore even more? Our in-app shop contains 100+ additional locations, 500+ pets and more than 600 new characters available for purchase. Toca Life World is constantly evolving, we see and hear our players' wishes and we're always always adding content to match the storytelling and play patterns that you want!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Are you already playing Toca Life series apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital and more? Great, you’ll feel right at home! When you download Toca Life World, we’ll help you bring all of your Toca Life stuff over so you can get busy building your own mini world.

A SAFE & SECURE PLATFORM
Toca Life World is a single player kids’ game and a place where you can be free to explore and create and play your characters and stories.

About Us:
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play. We design our products from a kid perspective to empower young people to be playful, creative and free to be whoever they want to be. Our fun and award-winning apps and kids’ games have been downloaded more than 849 million times in 215 countries. Go to tocaboca.com to learn more about Toca Boca and our products.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy
descriptionShort: Create and play your game characters. Design a mini world and choose your story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
There are always new things happening in Toca Life World. Fear of missing out? Make sure that you have automatic updates turned on!

Improvements in this version include:
- Fixed stability issues

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Welcome to Beak Street Building, your new empty & deluxe home in Toca Life World just waiting for YOUR ideas and decorations! What will you do with YOUR setup? Set the scene for neighbors destined to fall in love? Or let a family with kids move into one apartment and their grandparents in the other? Or pair a sound sensitive writer with a new drummer floor mate? The options are endless! Fill with any furniture you already have or plan on getting. A ladder, doorbells and mailboxes are included.

11 LOCATIONS & 40+ CHARACTERS INCLUDED IN THE FREE GAME DOWNLOAD

THE HOME DESIGNER & CHARACTER CREATOR TOOLS

GET NEW LOCATIONS AND ITEMS

descriptionShort: Create and play your game characters. Design a mini world and choose your story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Ahoy! The SpongeBob SquarePants Furniture Pack is here and it’s filled with furniture and decorations for you to mix, match and design your very own Bikini Bottom. Act out SpongeBob’s morning routine, throw a jellyfish jam or who knows, maybe you’ll find new ways to annoy Squidward! Will you go nautical like SpongeBob, blue & bamboo like Squidward or aim for Patrick’s sandy aesthetic? Either way, you’ll love this pack as much as SpongeBob loves Krabby Patties! Available for a limited time only.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Be a beauty entrepreneur, style influencer or get ready for some me-time with the Get Glossy Furniture Pack! It’s everything you need to create your dream beauty store, whether you’re the CEO, a store clerk or a customer restocking your self-care supplies. Unwind with super chill products from Sloo, get glitzed up with ultra-glam makeup from GLNCE, spritz Iva by Iva Blue, the brand new perfume by our fave Voxella Festival star, or mix and match for the ULTIMATE makeover!

descriptionShort: Create and play your game characters. Design a mini world and choose your story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Don’t be late! Class is starting at OK Street High! Get to know a brand new friend group as the new kid in class or get even closer to your bestie gang. Catch up by the lockers and spill all about your new crush or that embarrassing moment in the canteen yesterday. Run for class president or skip band practice to hang with the popular kids. Keep on top of ALL the drama and hide in the cafeteria to update your secret school gossip page. And most importantly: Will you go to prom? And who with?

CREATE YOUR OWN CHARACTERS & HOMES
Toca Life World is the perfect game for anyone looking to explore, express themselves and let their creativity shine. Or, you can get cozy and have a quiet moment relaxing in your mini world! WEEKLY GIFTS
Every Friday, players can claim brand new gifts at the Post Office, completely free of charge. Besides Fridays, there are also other gift events to look out for. Over the years, we’ve celebrated Lunar New Year, Valentine’s Day, the winter holidays and more with awesome gift events! And don’t worry if you’re new to the game, you haven't missed out! 11 LOCATIONS & 40+ CHARACTERS INCLUDED IN THE FREE GAME DOWNLOAD
The basic yet extensive version of Toca Life World is free to download. Start discovering your mini world by visiting Bop City, a vibrant city area with many different locations all ready for you to discover. Check out the hair salon, shopping mall, food court, and your first apartment! It’s a great place to unlock secrets, decorate, create and play your own stories!

THE HOME DESIGNER & CHARACTER CREATOR TOOLS
The fun Home Designer (including a Free House) and Character Creator tools are included in the free game download. They’re both perfect for expressing yourself: decorate your houses and buildings in your unique style and create and play your own characters!

GET NEW LOCATIONS AND ITEMS
Already discovered all the free game locations and want to explore even more? Our in-app shop contains 100+ additional locations, 500+ pets and more than 600 new characters available for purchase. Toca Life World is constantly evolving, we see and hear our players' wishes and we're always always adding content to match the storytelling and play patterns that you want!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Presenting the 5 Star Hotel, our biggest Home Designer House ever! Will you and your family be staying or are you running your own 3 floor hotel? title:
Toca Life World: Build a Story
1.84

creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Toca Life World is a game with endless possibilities, where you design and decorate a whole world and fill it with fun characters you collect, create and play! Tell your own stories, whatever they may be – adventures, make-over tales, reality shows, or anything and everything you can imagine! What will you do first – spend a day at the beach with friends or direct your own sitcom? Design a restaurant or run a dog daycare center? Express yourself, explore a mini world filled with fun and don't forget to collect your gift every Friday!

YOU’LL LOVE TOCA LIFE WORLD​ BECAUSE YOU CAN:
• Download the app and start playing right away
• Use the Home Designer tool to design & decorate your own houses
• Make your own unique characters with the Character Creator
• Get exciting gifts every Friday
• Explore new game locations
• Unlock hundreds of secrets
• Create and play on a secure platform

CREATE YOUR OWN CHARACTERS & HOMES
Toca Life World is the perfect game for anyone looking to explore, express themselves and let their creativity shine. Or, you can get cozy and have a quiet moment relaxing in your mini world! How you play is up to you: you're in charge of building your own world, creating your own characters and homes and telling your own stories!

WEEKLY GIFTS
Every Friday, players can claim brand new gifts at the Post Office. Besides Fridays, there are also other gift events to look out for. Over the years, we’ve celebrated Lunar New Year, Valentine’s Day, the winter holidays and more with awesome gift events! And don’t worry if you’re new to the game, you haven't missed out! We have annual Gift Bonanzas when we re-release selections of previous years’ gifts so you can build your new world!

11 LOCATIONS & 40+ CHARACTERS INCLUDED AS SOON AS YOU DOWNLOAD THE GAME
In the basic yet extensive version of Toca Life World, start discovering your mini world by visiting Bop City, a vibrant city area with many different locations all ready for you to discover. Check out the hair salon, shopping mall, food court, and your first apartment! It’s a great place to unlock secrets, decorate, create and play your own stories!

THE HOME DESIGNER & CHARACTER CREATOR TOOLS
The fun Home Designer (including a house) and Character Creator tools are included when you download the game. They’re both perfect for expressing yourself: decorate your houses and buildings in your unique style and create and play your own characters!

GET NEW LOCATIONS AND ITEMS
Already discovered all the locations that were included when downloading the game and want to explore even more? Our in-app shop contains 100+ additional locations, 500+ pets and more than 600 new characters available for purchase. Toca Life World is constantly evolving, we see and hear our players' wishes and we're always always adding content to match the storytelling and play patterns that you want!

A SAFE & SECURE PLATFORM
Toca Life World is a single player kids’ game and a place where you can be free to explore and create and play your characters and stories.

About Us:
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play. We design our products from a kid perspective to empower them to be playful, creative and free to be whoever they want to be. Our fun and award-winning apps and kids’ games have been downloaded more than 849 million times in 215 countries. Go to tocaboca.com to learn more about Toca Boca and our products.

Privacy is something that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy
descriptionShort: Create and play your game characters. Design a mini world and choose your story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Know what’s nice? New Willow Tree Park with its flowers, trees and great spots to hang out, meet up with friends, play games, do sports, visit the food trucks or enjoy a picnic together. A park to bring your date for a lazy stroll to admire the swans or plan out a detective story, eavesdropping and observing from a favorite bench. This park is for everyone, especially you! Even better, it’s the perfect setting for an Easter egg hunt so make sure to get your Easter treats from the Post Office!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: There’s something, well lots of things on their way to Toca Life World! For anyone with a bug for home designing, you’ll love the Y2K Loft in Home Designer – after all, you can never have too much neon! And to celebrate series 2 POV coming every Saturday, we’ll be dropping special gifts in the Post Office for each episode! Want more gifts? For Earth Day we’ll also be giving away what might look like trash, but really it just needs a bit of fixing – look out for our DIY gifts!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: So cute! Head to new Little Paws Daycare, it’s a jungle in there! There’s so much to play with! descriptionShort: Create, customize & explore your Toca Boca story! Endless fun & creativity await

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: It’s time for fall! Get ready to live out your best cozy life in the brand new Maple Avenue Building, our first ever two-story empty house. Throw a Halloween party in the leveled garden or get comfy with a book on the balcony. And there's a TON of fall furniture and decorations coming to Home Designer on October 8th! Did we mention it’s spooky season? We're celebrating Halloween with a spooky start screen, decorations in the Post Office and four awesome gifts dropping October 18th!

title:
Toca Boca World
1.97

creator: Toca Boca
descriptionHtml:
Toca Boca World: A Playground of Endless Fun, Creativity & Discovery!

Step into Toca Boca World, a vibrant and dynamic universe where you can play, create and explore like never before! Whether you’re designing your dream home, spending a day at the beach with friends, or running a unique pet daycare, the possibilities are endless.

What will you explore first? Design your dream apartment, direct your own sitcom, or manage a bustling restaurant! The choice is yours in this expansive world where you can create your own stories, play with your characters and explore exciting new locations.

WHY YOU'LL LOVE TOCA BOCA WORLD:
•Instant Fun – Download the app and start playing right away!
•Create Your Stories – Create, design and tell your own stories in your unique way.
•Home Designer – Use the Home Designer to create and decorate homes to your taste.
•Character Creator – Create custom characters with the Character Creator, giving them unique styles and personalities.
•Weekly Surprises – Explore weekly gifts every Friday to keep the fun going!
•Engage in Roleplay – Play out imaginative scenarios and roleplay adventures with your characters.
•Explore New Locations – Visit new places and play in a variety of fun-filled environments.
•Unlock Hidden Secrets – Explore and discover hundreds of secrets hidden throughout the world.
•Safe & Secure Play – Enjoy a protected environment for kids to explore, create and play freely.

Toca Boca World is the perfect game for those who want to explore, unleash their creativity, and express themselves. Whether you're designing characters or simply enjoying a quiet moment in your own world, it offers endless ways to play, relax and create.

WEEKLY GIFTS TO EXPLORE:
Every Friday, discover surprise gifts at the Post Office. During our annual Gift Bonanza, explore re-released gifts from previous years!

START WITH 11 LOCATIONS & 40+ CHARACTERS TO PLAY WITH:
Jump into Bop City and explore the hair salon, shopping mall, food court or your first apartment. Play your story with 40+ characters, create new scenarios and uncover hidden surprises along the way.

CREATE & CUSTOMIZE YOUR WORLD:
Both the Home Designer and Character Creator tools are included in the download! Design and customize stunning interiors and create unique characters. The power to create is in your hands!

EXPAND YOUR WORLD FOR MORE PLAY:
Ready for more? Explore the in-app shop with 100+ new locations, 500+ pets, and 600+ characters available for purchase, offering endless opportunities to create, play and explore even further. Add new houses, furniture and pets to expand your world!

SAFE, CREATIVE, SINGLE-PLAYER FUN:
Toca Boca World provides a secure, single-player environment where kids can freely create, play and explore their imaginations.

ABOUT US: At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to inspire creativity. Our award-winning apps have been enjoyed by children in over 215 countries, with more than 849 million downloads worldwide. Visit tocaboca.com to learn more about our mission to empower kids to create, play and explore in a fun, safe environment.

We take privacy seriously. Learn more at tocaboca.com/privacy.

Download Toca Boca World for Free and Start Playing Today! In-app purchases available.
